passages.text:
The town is quiet, streetlights hum, illuminating an empty street, except for the shadow of a waddling raccoon, slipping into an alley behind the restaurant for a midnight snack.

The town center quickly gives way to residential homes, all dark with sleeping cars in driveways. The occasional flicker of an unattended TV set shines through thin curtains.

In the second story of one of these houses, a bright yellow light spills from a window into the darkness outside, which was thick enough to prevent said light from reaching the sidewalk. 

Inside, a computer clock flips over to 2:00AM, the room silent except for the crunching of tortilla chips, and frantic clicks and clacks of the keyboard.

---

[[Next->Living Room]]

[[Begin]]
passages.name: Sleeping Town

passages.text:
The person inside is sprawled on their couch, hunched over a laptop. The TV at the other side of the room, across a coffee table covered in crumbs and junk mail, steadily shows a selection of movies releated to the recently-finished _Dinodon vs. Dodecapus_

Their laptop screen, however, is littered with open browser tabs, oddly-sized dark windows of code, and command terminals running various operations. One of the operations finishes, the computer emitting a soft, and disapproving "beep".

"Ugh." the quiet sigh fills the room that otherwise lacked sounds to fill it.

The open up a new window, connecting to a chat application, desperate enough for help to actually talk to someone.

{{#if username}}They enter `{{username}}`
{{else}}They enter their username.{{/if}}


{{#data_set username=">>"}}{{/data_set}}

---

[[Login->LambdaMix Server #lambda-help]]
passages.name: Living Room

passages.text:
{{#chat}}
{{username}}: Hey I need some help with a thing.

{{username}}: I'm trying to access `getSubviewId` like it says in the docs, but I'm getting an error: `getSubviewId is not a property of LambdaDash.MainView`

{{username}}: Are the docs out of date or something?
{{/chat}}

After 30 seconds of no response, they get up, tossing their laptop to bounce on the couch cushions, and head for the kitchen to refill their bowl of cheese puffs. Their hands are shaky, fumbling the container while yawning. A muffled ***ping!*** rings out from the couch mid puff pour. Hastily putting everything away, they hop back onto the couch, and check out the message.

---

[[(1) Message->Message with fc_mindMap]]

[[Yes->Message with fc_mindMap: directions.license transferred]]
[[No->Message with fc_mindMap: directions.license rejected]]
passages.name: Message with fc_mindMap
Begin

passages.text:
Ugh. It's all credit card offers and schools asking for a "gift." 

Their phone buzzes, a reminder to drop off the muffins they made earlier for Kat, along with the rest of the "get well soon" package. After a few seconds to rest, they hop off the couch to get to work. 

They change out of their work "outfit" (athletic shorts and a tank top they've been wearing since yesterday), fill a tupperware with now-cooled muffins from the rack (saving some of the burnt and less-pretty ones for themselves), and grab a gift bag full of goodies. After checking that they have everything, including the essential "wallet, keys, phone"-check, they slam the door to their apartment behind them, and head out into the late-afternoon sun.

They squint a bit as they step onto the sidewalk. Muttering to themselves, "Where was her place, again?"

Do they wander around, trying to remember? Or look up the address on their phone?

---
